class="textbar style_1 wpb_content_element "><h2>WHY CHOOSE SKILLSTREAM?</h2><a href="https://skillstream.co.uk/?page_id=184" class="btn-bt default"><span>Find Out More</span><i class=""></i></a></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="fws_5c8585183aa73" class="vc_row vc_row-fluid  animate_onoffset row-dynamic-el section-style    " style="background-color: #f5f5f5; " ><div  style="position: absolute;top: 0;"></div><div class="container  dark"><div class="section_clear"><div class="vc_col-sm-12 vc_column column_container with_padding with_animation animated " style="padding:" data-animation="fadeIn" data-delay="0"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_content_element block_title section_title inner-square "><h1>Product and Services</h1><span class="divider"><span class="line"></span><span class="circle"></span><span class="line"></span></span></div><div class="vc_empty_space"   style="height: 30px" ><span class="vc_empty_space_inner"></span></div><div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid"><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p>Skillstream offers a wide range of technology solutions, tailored to specific market and industry requirements. Our workforce management platforms offer a suite of procurement capabilities that work to mitigate risk, drive process efficiency and ensure legislative and corporate compliance.</p><p>Each technology can be tailored to meet individual client needs and requirements. From our original workforce management solution right through to our state of the art rostering, agency healthcare and bank staff management tools.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p>We have a product suited to meet each of the major challenges faced when working with a temporary or flexible workforce. By setting stringent guidelines and system rules, our clients are able to effectively track and manage both coverage and spend of their workforce, whilst ensuring legislative guidelines are adhered to.</p><p>Each solution offers a number of reporting functionalities as well as visual reporting tools, enabling senior management to easily visualise and identify data trends.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="fws_5c8585183b7ab" class="vc_row vc_row-fluid  animate_onoffset row-dynamic-el section-style    " style="background-color: #515151; " ><div  style="position: absolute;top: 0;"></div><div class="container  light"><div class="section_clear"><div class="vc_col-sm-3 vc_column column_container with_padding " style="padding:" data-animation="none" data-delay=""><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="animated_counter"><i class="moon-earth"></i><div class="count_to animate_onoffset"><div class="odometer" data-number="20" data-duration="2000"></div></div><h3>Skillstream operates across 20 countries</h3></div></div></div><div class="vc_col-sm-3 vc_column column_container with_padding " style="padding:" data-animation="none" data-delay=""><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="animated_counter"><i class="steadysets-icon-health"></i><div class="count_to animate_onoffset"><div class="odometer" data-number="15" data-duration="2000"></div></div><h3>Present in 15 NHS trusts</h3></div></div></div><div class="vc_col-sm-3 vc_column column_container with_padding " style="padding:" data-animation="none" data-delay=""><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="animated_counter"><i class="moon-home-9"></i><div class="count_to animate_onoffset"><div class="odometer" data-number="10,000" data-duration="2000"></div></div><h3>Works with over 10,000 Agencies</h3></div></div></div><div class="vc_col-sm-3 vc_column column_container with_padding " style="padding:" data-animation="none" data-delay=""><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="animated_counter"><i class="moon-happy"></i><div class="count_to animate_onoffset"><div class="odometer" data-number="90" data-duration="2000"></div></div><h3>Satisfies over 90 clients globally</h3></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="fws_5c8585183c97f" class="vc_row vc_row-fluid  animate_onoffset row-dynamic-el section-style    " style="background-image: url(); background-position: left top; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-color: #f5f5f5; padding-top: 100px ; padding-bottom: 100px ; " ><div  style="position: absolute;top: 0;"></div><div class="container  dark"><div class="section_clear"><div class="vc_col-sm-12 vc_column column_container with_padding with_animation animated " style="padding:" data-animation="fadeInLeft" data-delay="0"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_content_element block_title section_title inner-square "><h1>Testimonials</h1><span class="divider"><span class="line"></span><span class="circle"></span><span class="line"></span></span></div><div class="wpb_content_element testimonial_carousel_element"><div class="pagination"><a href="#" class="prev"><i class="icon-chevron-left"></i></a><a href="#" class="next"><i class="icon-chevron-right"></i></a></div><section class="row testimonial_carousel" data-duration="500"><div class="item"><p>Finding the right partner to support us was key, and in Skillstream we did that. We needed to rollout a solution capable of spanning every division across multiple locations. For the first time our reporting was complete.</p><div class="param"><h6>Global FMCG Manufacturer,</h6><span class="position"> </span></div></div><div class="item"><p>Skillstream supported us all the way from solution design through to day to day operations with regular reviews – this truly is software as a service at its best.</p><div class="param"><h6>Media Business,</h6><span class="position"> </span></div></div><div class="item"><p>We looked at a range of suppliers but were impressed by the consultative, flexible approach offered by Skillstream. They offered excellent value & embraced our approach to the way we wanted the project to run.</p><div class="param"><h6>Global Bank,</h6><span class="position"> </span></div></div></section></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="fws_5c8585183e277" class="vc_row vc_row-fluid  animate_onoffset row-dynamic-el standard_section    " style="" ><div  style="position: absolute;top: 0;"></div><div class="container  dark"><div class="section_clear"><div class="vc_col-sm-12 vc_column column_container with_padding with_animation animated " style="padding:" data-animation="fadeIn" data-delay="0"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_content_element block_title column_title inner-inline_border "><h1>The Benefits Of Workforce Solutions</h1></div><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p style="text-align: left;">Skillstream is a bespoke workforce management solution that allows tighter control, reporting and visibility of the contingent workforce.</p><p style="text-align: left;">It hugely improves process efficiency and budgetary control and delivers fantastic results almost immediately. Some of the key benefits are:</p></div></div><div class="vc_empty_space"   style="height: 30px" ><span class="vc_empty_space_inner"></span></div><div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid"><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1503564179707"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element  accordion-title vc_custom_1503563877741"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p style="text-align: center;">Pay your agreed rates and no more</p></div></div><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p>With Skillstream’s Rate Card functionality, the system can be preloaded with negotiated / agreed pay rates for each individual contractor or temp discipline – meaning you will never be overcharged for your requirements.</p><p>Skillstream can support any Framework rates, including but not limited too Crown Commercial Services, Health Trust Europe and London Procurement Partnership.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1503564186212"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element  accordion-title vc_custom_1503564331819"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p style="text-align: center;">Visibility</p></div></div><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p>Skillstream allows clients full visibility of their entire workforce through real time access to management information. Its core functionality allows clients to view, manage and track vacancies, candidates, interviews, budgets, and supplier performance in real time.</p><p>The reporting functions can be fully tailored to appear at the click of a button providing Finance, HR or Procurement with an accurate and up to date analysis of the businesses current performance.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="vc_empty_space"   style="height: 20px" ><span class="vc_empty_space_inner"></span></div><div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid"><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1503564179707"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element  accordion-title vc_custom_1503563885245"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p style="text-align: center;">Remote application access</p></div></div><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p>The Skillstream application is accessible through both android and apple devices (both smartphone and tablet), meaning users with the required permissions can create requisitions, authorise timesheets, view management information on the move.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1503564186212"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element  accordion-title vc_custom_1503564300025"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p style="text-align: center;">Interface with entry & exit systems</p></div></div><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p>Skillstream has the ability to interface with entry & exit systems allowing for the automatic generation of timesheets based on the contractors / temps gate data information. With this interface, Skillstream takes away the admin associated with filling out timesheets and creates a more robust, secure and accurate process.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="vc_empty_space"   style="height: 20px" ><span class="vc_empty_space_inner"></span></div><div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid"><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1503564179707"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element  accordion-title vc_custom_1503564377692"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p style="text-align: center;">Process Consistency</p></div></div><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p>Skillstream’s workflows and process maps have been developed in close conjunction with many agency suppliers. Using their long experience of professional recruitment we have made it a key criteria of the design that it is built to deliver an effective process to all user groups: hirers, agencies, and candidates.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1503564186212"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element  accordion-title vc_custom_1503564434211"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p style="text-align: center;">Document Library – Compliance</p></div></div><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p>Due to the bespoke nature of the Skillstream technology we are able to fully tailor client requirements to document and store vital 3rd party information relating to legislative, fiscal or corporate policy such as qualifications, criminal check’s, disclosure and barring. The software will alert and flag when any of the required documentation is expiring or due for renewal, ensuring full legal compliance at all times.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="vc_empty_space"   style="height: 20px" ><span class="vc_empty_space_inner"></span></div><div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid"><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1503564179707"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element  accordion-title vc_custom_1503564479707"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p style="text-align: center;">Management information and back office</p></div></div><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p>Skillstream management information allows all appropriate users to generate a range of real time reports in standard formats.</p><p>Our real time reports are tailored to individual client requirements and can include budgetary spend, due diligence, security processes and compliance checks, as well as giving you the ability to review of the recruitment process and agencies performance criteria.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1503564186212"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element  accordion-title vc_custom_1503564510324"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p style="text-align: center;">Process Management</p></div></div><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p>With over 10 years of industry experience, we understand the challenges involved with changing processes on a large scale. Our knowledge and expertise enables us to guide you through what can be a very complicated process.</p><p>Our team industry experts are here to help you implement, plan, execute and communicate change in the right way.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="vc_empty_space"   style="height: 20px" ><span class="vc_empty_space_inner"></span></div><div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid"><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1503564179707"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element  accordion-title vc_custom_1503564542065"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p style="text-align: center;">Workforce planning</p></div></div><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p>With Skillstream’s workforce solution you are able to monitor and deliver a clear and concise workforce management plan for both the short-term and the long-term business objectives.</p><p>Our bespoke reporting function will give you full visibility of how the business is preforming. Enabling you to careful forecast against business needs and ensure you have the correct resources available to facilitate success.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6"><div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1503564186212"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element  accordion-title vc_custom_1503564575086"><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p style="text-align: center;">Time & Attendance Management</p></div></div><div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element "><div class="wpb_wrapper"><p>Skillstream technology has the ability to interface with entry and exit systems allowing for automatic generation of timesheets based on the contractors / temps gate data information.</p><p>With this interface, Skillstream takes away the admin associated with filling out timesheets and creates a more robust, secure and accurate process.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="fws_5c858518418aa" class="vc_row vc_row-fluid  animate_onoffset row-dynamic-el section-style    "
